issue.title: [C++] Write prose documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3986](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3986). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that the C++ docs are in the Sphinx doctree, we should write more comprehensive prose documentation for C++ programmers.
